name: part_002
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Hakos Baelz introduces the stage design, inspired by traditional Japanese aesthetics ('Wa'), and explains the theme of the live performance.
Performance section: Hakos Baelz and guest artist Gero perform the song 'Kairai'.

subtitles.original: 汐を... 汐を見たんです。今はね。
subtitles.english: The salt... I was looking at the salt. For now.

subtitles.original: Ne! Ah, I wanted to do like... I just wanted to say hi to you guys as well.
subtitles.english: Right! Ah, I wanted to do like... I just wanted to say hi to you guys as well.

subtitles.original: This is like the first time I get to say hi to you guys as well.
subtitles.english: This is like the first time I get to say hi to you guys as well.

subtitles.original: Look at the stage!
subtitles.english: Look at the stage!

subtitles.original: このステージ見て！ ウッホー！
subtitles.english: Look at this stage! Woohoo!

subtitles.original: This is my... this is my Japanese heart stage. 見て！ This is also a Taiko here.
subtitles.english: This is my... this is my Japanese heart stage. Look! This is also a Taiko here.

subtitles.original: Don don don!
subtitles.english: Don don don!

subtitles.original: That's not how you play Taiko. Oh my goodness. Anyway...
subtitles.english: That's not how you play Taiko. Oh my goodness. Anyway...

subtitles.original: This is the stage that I... that was specially created for this live.
subtitles.english: This is the stage that I... that was specially created for this live.

subtitles.original: Because... the theme of today's live, I don't know if you've noticed, is...
subtitles.english: Because... the theme of today's live, I don't know if you've noticed, is...

subtitles.original: ...the aesthetics of traditional Japanese...
subtitles.english: ...the aesthetics of traditional Japanese...

subtitles.original: No, that's not how it goes. It's the traditional Japanese aesthetic plus dance.
subtitles.english: No, that's not how it goes. It's the traditional Japanese aesthetic plus dance.

subtitles.original: えっとね、今日のライブね、テーマはね、和とダンスですよ。
subtitles.english: Well, for today's live, the theme is 'Wa' and dance.

subtitles.original: なんかね... So a lot of the songs tonight may have kind of that traditional feel.
subtitles.english: Somehow... So a lot of the songs tonight may have kind of that traditional feel.

subtitles.original: えっと、今夜の曲はね、ちょっと「和」が入ってるかな？っていう気持ちで、あの...
subtitles.english: Well, tonight's songs... with a feeling that they have a bit of 'Wa' in them, um...

subtitles.original: パフォーマンスしたいなと思ってます。
subtitles.english: ...I'm thinking I'd like to perform.

subtitles.original: So, um, get excited! There's still a lot more to come.
subtitles.english: So, um, get excited! There's still a lot more to come.

subtitles.original: Please use the hashtag as well. Uh... dotchi? This one!
subtitles.english: Please use the hashtag as well. Uh... which one? This one!

subtitles.original: Please use the hashtag #BaeDDay2025.
subtitles.english: Please use the hashtag #BaeDDay2025.

subtitles.original: Who knows? I might be gone by the end. Who knows? I really don't know if I'm gonna survive tonight.
subtitles.english: Who knows? I might be gone by the end. Who knows? I really don't know if I'm gonna survive tonight.

subtitles.original: But, I hope you are in the ride... Oh, that's not how the saying goes. Wow, I actually can't talk.
subtitles.english: But, I hope you are in the ride... Oh, that's not how the saying goes. Wow, I actually can't talk.

subtitles.original: Hope you guys stay on this crazy ride with me until the very end.
subtitles.english: Hope you guys stay on this crazy ride with me until the very end.

subtitles.original: Um, but yeah! So we did Kyutyu-ri-pappa... I can never say that song right.
subtitles.english: Um, but yeah! So we did Kyutyu-ri-pappa... I can never say that song right.

subtitles.original: As the opening, it was so much fun.
subtitles.english: As the opening, it was so much fun.

subtitles.original: De-de-de-de-de-de-de-de-de-de-de with my amazing dancers, as usual.
subtitles.english: De-de-de-de-de-de-de-de-de-de-de with my amazing dancers, as usual.

subtitles.original: I hope that was a good opener. And also, Ashi-no-chon!
subtitles.english: I hope that was a good opener. And also, Ashi-no-chon!

subtitles.original: For those who watched the afternoon dance... dance bit, I hope...
subtitles.english: For those who watched the afternoon dance... dance bit, I hope...

subtitles.original: ...if you haven't, please check it out.
subtitles.english: ...if you haven't, please check it out.

subtitles.original: あの、午後にね、ダンスリハの部分もね、見てない方はぜひ見ててください。
subtitles.english: Um, if you haven't seen the dance rehearsal part in the afternoon, please do check it out.

subtitles.original: I learned the last chorus today at noon, so please watch it.
subtitles.english: I learned the last chorus today at noon, so please watch it.

subtitles.original: I did my best. So, I hope Miki-sensei is proud of me. Yes!
subtitles.english: I did my best. So, I hope Miki-sensei is proud of me. Yes!

subtitles.original: Uh, that's... and you can compare how I was at, you know, the afternoon with what you just saw.
subtitles.english: Uh, that's... and you can compare how I was at, you know, the afternoon with what you just saw.

subtitles.original: But! The show is going to keep on going, it keeps on giving.
subtitles.english: But! The show is going to keep on going, it keeps on giving.

subtitles.original: So, it is time for the very first guest.
subtitles.english: So, it is time for the very first guest.

subtitles.original: ゲスト、ゲストパート入りますんですけど、誰かな？
subtitles.english: Guest, we're moving on to the guest part, but I wonder who it is?

subtitles.original: Who could it be? I don't know, we'll see.
subtitles.english: Who could it be? I don't know, we'll see.

subtitles.original: You better stay, okay? I'm gonna go. Don't... don't you go anywhere. Okay?
subtitles.english: You better stay, okay? I'm gonna go. Don't... don't you go anywhere. Okay?

subtitles.original: 雷鳴！
subtitles.english: Thunderclap!

subtitles.original: 雷鳴！
subtitles.english: Thunderclap!

subtitles.original: 心ゆくまで雷鳴
subtitles.english: Thunderclap to your heart's content

subtitles.original: どちらか天井全景
subtitles.english: A panoramic view of the ceiling

subtitles.original: 悪魔の再現
subtitles.english: A reproduction of the devil

Kairai

subtitles.original: 熾るは東京旋回
subtitles.english: Kindling, a Tokyo revolution

subtitles.original: 焦がれ浴びたい 情熱繚乱
subtitles.english: Longing to bask in a profusion of passion

subtitles.original: 狂うた動乱のまにまに
subtitles.english: In the midst of a mad upheaval

subtitles.original: 言葉も無いやと呟いた
subtitles.english: I muttered that there are no words

subtitles.original: ヘルタースケルター心臓に
subtitles.english: Helter-skelter, in my heart

subtitles.original: 構えろよジーザス 祈ったって恩寵
subtitles.english: Ready yourself, Jesus; even a prayer is a blessing

subtitles.original: 崩壊するドメスティックブランド
subtitles.english: A collapsing domestic brand

subtitles.original: 雑多風上 鳴動せよ
subtitles.english: In the miscellaneous windward, let it rumble

subtitles.original: 覚醒する闘志と
subtitles.english: With an awakening fighting spirit

subtitles.original: 稲光り奔る影
subtitles.english: And a shadow racing through lightning

subtitles.original: 乾杯 禅 尽きぬ闇風
subtitles.english: Cheers, Zen, to the endless dark wind

subtitles.original: 誰彼の塩梅 モードウェザー
subtitles.english: The state of whoever, mode weather

subtitles.original: 喰らえ 止まらぬ 狂った手も
subtitles.english: Take this, even these mad, unstoppable hands

subtitles.original: 燃える光に
subtitles.english: Into the burning light

subtitles.original: 宿りし神の 綴じ目の限りを
subtitles.english: To the limit of the seams of the indwelling god

subtitles.original: 雷鳴！
subtitles.english: Thunderclap!

subtitles.original: 共鳴 愛した僕の震を
subtitles.english: Resonance, the tremor of my love

subtitles.original: 愚弄になって 飛び出せ心臓
subtitles.english: Turn into mockery, burst forth, my heart

subtitles.original: 想像すれば全部
subtitles.english: If you imagine it, everything

subtitles.original: 最悪も魔の色は
subtitles.english: Even the worst, the color of the devil

subtitles.original: 目指して揺らして
subtitles.english: Aiming and swaying

subtitles.original: 超えたいのになあと
subtitles.english: Thinking how I want to overcome it

subtitles.original: 頭 鳴らして 雷鳴
subtitles.english: Ringing in my head, a thunderclap

subtitles.original: 起きよの果て 雷鳴
subtitles.english: The end of awakening, a thunderclap

subtitles.english: A declaration of penitence

subtitles.english: Make it resound, a Tokyo revolution

subtitles.original: 今宵 奔放な 狂うた動乱
subtitles.english: Tonight, a wild and mad upheaval

subtitles.original: 擦るは諸悪の何彼に
subtitles.english: Rubbing against whatever of all evils

subtitles.original: 悶えた ヘルタースケルター 心臓に
subtitles.english: Writhing helter-skelter, in my heart

subtitles.original: 動じない 試されてみたい

subtitles.english: Concrete jungle

subtitles.english: Night after night, the endless main road

subtitles.english: Get intoxicated; tonight is a Tokyo revolution

subtitles.original: 中枢的 都市の
subtitles.english: Of the pivotal city

subtitles.original: 私 あの ブルジョワ
subtitles.english: I am that bourgeois

subtitles.original: 改良 全部 不当
subtitles.english: Improvements are all unfair

subtitles.original: 加速す 逆戻のウェザー
subtitles.english: Accelerating, a backward-turning weather

subtitles.original: 喰らいつく 胸に
subtitles.english: Biting into my chest

subtitles.original: 葛藤が覆うと
subtitles.english: When conflict covers it

subtitles.english: Light it up

subtitles.original: 照らせよ 若夜
subtitles.english: Illuminate the young night
